text: Marcolino Neto Silva Lima de Sá (born 17 May 1996), commonly known as Marcolino or Neto Marcolino, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Greek Super League 2 club Levadiakos. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! rowspan=2 | Club ! rowspan=2 | Season ! colspan=3 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Continental ! colspan=2 | Other ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
